name: @clfhhc/bmad-methods-skills
description: Convert BMAD-METHOD agents and workflows to Claude Skills format

scripts.clean: node -e "import('fs-extra').then(fs => { try { fs.removeSync('./.temp'); console.log('Cleaned temp directory'); } catch(e) { console.error('Error:', e.message); } })"
scripts.clean:all: node -e "import('fs-extra').then(fs => { try { fs.removeSync('./skills'); fs.removeSync('./.temp'); console.log('Cleaned skills and temp directories'); } catch(e) { console.error('Error:', e.message); } })"
